metadata.title: CVE-2021-47186 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  tipc: check for null after calling kmemdup  kmemdup can return a null pointer so need to check for it, otherwise the null key will be dereferenced later in tipc_crypto_key_xmit as can be seen in the trace [1].   [1] https://syzkaller.appspot.com/bug?id=bca180abb29567b189efdbdb34cbf7ba851c2a58
